title: Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack, Bam Batmobile Redbird Prank Bibi & Quizz, Batcast Metal Diecast Vehicles, Ages 3+
descriptions:
Introducing the Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack! Get ready for high-speed adventures with these incredible Batcast Metal diecast vehicles. This pack includes five iconic vehicles: Bam the Batmobile, Redbird, Prank, Bibi, and Quizz. 

These cars are built to impress with their working wheels and precise 1:55 scale design. Made from durable diecast metal, they are built to withstand even the toughest races. 

Bring the action to life with the Batwheels Race and Launch Batcave (sold separately, subject to availability). This compatible playset takes the excitement to a whole new level!

Recommended for ages 3 years and older, these Batwheels encourage imaginative play and storytelling. Kids will love creating epic Super Hero versus Super-Villain racing action. 

Don't miss out on this thrilling 5-pack of Batwheels! Get yours today and let the adventures begin!

Introducing the Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack! Get ready for epic racing adventures with these Batcast Metal diecast vehicles. This pack includes five amazing cars: Bam the Batmobile, Redbird, Prank, Bibi, and Quizz. 

These cars are built to impress, with working wheels that allow for smooth and realistic racing action. The 1:55 scale adds authenticity to the race, making you feel like you're a part of the action-packed world of Batman. 

But the fun doesn't stop there! These Batwheels are compatible with the Batwheels Race and Launch Batcave playset (sold separately and subject to availability). Create your own thrilling racecourses, launch the cars into action, and watch as they zoom through the track. 

Designed for children ages 3 years and older, these Batwheels encourage imaginative play and storytelling. Kids can create their own Super Hero versus Super-Villain racing action, bringing their favorite DC characters to life. 

Each car is made from high-quality diecast metal, ensuring durability and long-lasting play. These Batwheels are the perfect addition to any DC fan's collection. 

Unleash your child's inner hero and let their imagination soar with the Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack. Get ready for thrilling adventures and high-speed races!

Recommended for ages 3 and older, these Batwheels encourage imaginative play and storytelling. Let your little ones unleash their creativity as they create their own Super Hero versus Super-Villain racing action. 

Don't miss out on this must-have 5-pack of Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars. Get ready to rev your engines and embark on exciting adventures today!
